title: Azir Bug - Two Classic Skins
body: When you select Azir as a champ, he shows 2 classic skins and then his galactic skin. Screenshot of bug.

replies.body: Thanks for the post.  We are aware of this and hope to have a fix for it soon
this also has been my experience with Azir aswell every game I have selected him.
everyone gets it , and i think its intentional because iirc it was on the pbe aswell

That is a known problem I think, in the First two weeks, Newly released Champions got Two Classic skins, same was with Braum, Gnar and other new ones. And after maybe 3 weeks, the second Classic skin got removed. It may be a placeholder for the actual Classic / Default skin, because the Splash art comes when the Ingame-model is already finished ( i have Project Yasou and Headhunter Cait before live-release @PBE in mind)
